post.summary: Create a Scheduled Trip with a Scheduled Return Trip
post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new scheduled trip request which includes a scheduled return trip. The scheduled return trip must have either a pickup time or dropoff time specified

post.summary: Create a Scheduled Trip with a Flexible Return Trip
post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new scheduled trip request which includes a flexible return trip. The flexible return trip must specify the pickup date. On the return date, the rider will receive a text with a link that they can use to request a ride when they are ready for it.

get.description: This endpoint returns information about specified pickup locations at venues like airports, hospitals, and concert arenas. This helps to ensure that guests are picked up at the correct location with wayfinding notes to assist both riders and drivers.

200.description: Information about specified pickup locations at venues like airports, hospitals, and concert arenas.
